attributes.action: Stop general transport from areas which have been heavily hit by COVID-19.
attributes.background: Areas such as Italy, Spain, Iran and the USA, have been hit by the Corona Virus to a considerable measure (all have over 1,000 cases as of writing this). If we want to stop the flow of Corona virus, we must limit air and water traffic until countries have more recovered cases than active cases.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300932

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-information-for-the-public
